product_overview: The E-commerce Customer Analytics & Operations Dashboard is an integrated platform that provides real-time sales data, customer behavior insights, inventory management, order processing, and financial reporting to streamline e-commerce operations and decision-making.
core_goals: Provide real-time visibility into business performance and customer behavior.
Streamline operational workflows and reduce manual processes through automation.
Enable predictive analytics for inventory management and customer retention.
key_features: Real-time sales dashboard with KPIs, dynamic filters, and export capabilities.
Comprehensive customer behavior analytics including segmentation, funnel analysis, and cohort tracking.
Automated inventory management system with low stock alerts, reorder recommendations, and ABC categorization.
Order management interface with advanced search, bulk status updates, and customer profile integration.
Financial reporting and forecasting combining live data and Excel-based financial models.
user_flow_summary: User logs in and views the real-time sales dashboard to monitor current revenue, orders, and conversion rates.
Users navigate to the analytics page to analyze customer segments, track behavior funnels, and cohort retention.
Inventory managers review stock levels, receive low stock alerts, and export weekly inventory reports for procurement planning.
Customer service staff search and filter orders, update order statuses in bulk, access customer profiles, and record communication.
Finance teams generate and review financial dashboards, export detailed Excel reports, and update forecasting models for budget planning.
validation_criteria: All dashboard widgets load under 2 seconds with >99.5% data accuracy.
Customer event tracking captures over 99% of interactions with automatic segment updates.
Inventory alerts trigger correctly based on reorder points and ABC analysis properly categorizes products.
Order search and bulk update operations function smoothly handling up to 100 orders with email notification triggers.
Financial calculations and forecasting models demonstrate accuracy with automated daily report generation and email distribution.
